dbi.pg.PgException

class PgException: dbi.DBIException.DBIException;


this();
Create a new PgException.

this(char[] msg, char[] sql = "");
Create a new PgException.

Params:
char[] msg Message contents.
char[] sql SQL statement that caused the error. Defaults to nothing.

this(char[] msg, int errorCode, char[] sql = "");
Create a new PgException.

Params:
char[] msg Message contents.
int errorCode Database's numeric error code.
char[] sql SQL statement that caused the error. Defaults to nothing.

this(char[] msg, ErrorCode errorCode, char[] sql = "");
Create a new PgException.

Params:
char[] msg Message contents.
ErrorCode errorCode DBI's error code.
char[] sql SQL statement that caused the error. Defaults to nothing.

this(char[] msg, ErrorCode dbiCode, int specificCode, char[] sql = "");
Create a new PgException.

Params:
char[] msg Error message.
ErrorCode dbiCode DBI's error code.
int specificCode Database's numeric error code.
char[] sql SQL statement that caused the error. Defaults to an empty string.
